intro: Treleasea, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants native to Africa. These plants are characterized by their rosettes of velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. Treleasea species are typically small, herbaceous perennials that thrive in humid, shaded environments. They are popular houseplants due to their attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
